text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">DAS PRELIMINARES I</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">I-A) DA IN&Eacute;PCIA DA INICIAL </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A reclamante apresenta inicial formula pedidos infundados, haja vista que n&atilde;o apresenta a causa de pedir em rela&ccedil;&atilde;o a defendente - qui&ccedil;&aacute; indica o per&iacute;odo e o tipo de trabalho que enseja tais libelos relacionados.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Na maneira exposta a quarta reclamada fica cerceada em direito de defesa.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Neste sentido, posi&ccedil;&atilde;o jurisprudencial. O pedido inicial deve, necessariamente, conter fundamenta&ccedil;&atilde;o bastante que permita sua aprecia&ccedil;&atilde;o diante da legisla&ccedil;&atilde;o vigente. Cumpre &agrave; parte tra&ccedil;ar com precis&atilde;o a moldura f&aacute;tica para que o juiz aplique a lei. 5 Coment&aacute;rios ao C&oacute;digo de Processo Civil", 4&ordf; ed., Forense, Rio de Janeiro, 1983, p. 196. 6 Direito Processual do Trabalho - 21&ordf; Edi&ccedil;&atilde;o - Atlas. 5 (TRT/SP 19990508804 RO - Ac. 08&ordf;T. 20000641930) Jose Carlos da Silva Arouca - TRT - SP - DOE - 16/1/2001 S&oacute; isso basta para a decreta&ccedil;&atilde;o de in&eacute;pcia da inicial, com a extin&ccedil;&atilde;o do feito. Diante disso, embora a CLT seja omissa quanto a este aspecto, por&eacute;m em raz&atilde;o da aplica&ccedil;&atilde;o subsidi&aacute;ria do CPC, declarada inepta a inicial a extin&ccedil;&atilde;o do processo, sem julgamento de m&eacute;rito, com base no art. 301, III e 267 do CPC, por confus&atilde;o entre o pedido e a fundamenta&ccedil;&atilde;o, ou ainda por absoluta contradi&ccedil;&atilde;o entre a fundamenta&ccedil;&atilde;o e o pedido &eacute; a conseq&uuml;&ecirc;ncia l&oacute;gica. I</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">DA ILEGITIMIDADE PASSIVA AD CAUSAM DA RECLAMADA DEFENDENTE- </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pretende a autora responsabilizar a defende por pertencer a mesmo grupo econ&ocirc;mico de Itanhandu, &nbsp;Susa do Brasil Vulcasul e demais r&eacute;s. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Assevera que "As empresas <strong>PALMILHADO BOOTS IND&Uacute;STRIA E COM&Eacute;RCIO LTDA; ITANHANDU IND&Uacute;STRIA E COMERCIO DE EPI LTDA; e SUSA DO BRASIL IND&Uacute;STRIA E COM&Eacute;RCIO DE COUROS E CONFEC&Ccedil;&Otilde;ES LTDA </strong>(Terceira, Quarta e Quinta Reclamada, respectivamente), da mesma forma, s&atilde;o empresas de um mesmo grupo econ&ocirc;mico e pertencentes a um grupo familiar &uacute;nico, inclusive, ao que consta, a Quinta Reclamada possui sede tamb&eacute;m em Itanhandu, sendo no Rio uma filial."</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; N&atilde;o &eacute; verdade que a reclamada comp&otilde;e o mesmo grupo de outras empresas trazidas autos. Trata-se de realidade de empresas concorrentes. N&atilde;o h&aacute; fundamento algum para figurar no p&oacute;lo passivo. Note-se que o autor n&atilde;o fundamenta seu pedido de reconhecimento de responsabilidade solid&aacute;ria em pseudo terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O fundamento &eacute; t&atilde;o somente uma inexist&ecirc;ncia de grupo econ&ocirc;mico. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ora, a defendente simplesmente comprou produtos fabricados pela empregadora do autor, nada mais. Se houvesse algo de il&iacute;cito nisso, certamente n&atilde;o haveria autoriza&ccedil;&atilde;o da JUCESP.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A rela&ccedil;&atilde;o entre a defendente e a primeira reclamada foi mercantil, como autorizada pelo contrato social de ambas, correspondente a compra de cabedais de cal&ccedil;ado pronto. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verifica-se tratar de rela&ccedil;&atilde;o devidamente documentada em notas fiscais, que afastam a tese obreira.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; N&atilde;o havia terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o de atividade fim, como alega a autora. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Note-se n&atilde;o ter a autora produzida prova alguma do grupo econ&ocirc;mico.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ainda assim a condena&ccedil;&atilde;o contempla dos pedidos da autora.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 106.2pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p style="margin-left: 106.2pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">"Muito embora as duas primeiras reclamadas possuam raz&otilde;es sociais e propriet&aacute;rios distintos, h&aacute; forte interdepend&ecirc;ncia entre elas, sendo evidente o interesse econ&ocirc;mico e jur&iacute;dico que as une, tanto que est&atilde;o sendo representadas pelo mesmo corpo jur&iacute;dico, tendo apresentado defesa comum, e possuem a mesma preposta. &Eacute; importante frisar que as duas empresas s&atilde;o de propriedade de pessoas da mesma fam&iacute;lia, c&ocirc;njuges, na realidade, o que evidencia, somado &agrave;s demais evid&ecirc;ncias j&aacute; apresentadas, que ambas formam um grupo econ&ocirc;mico.</em><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p style="margin-left: 106.2pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">Assim, reconhe&ccedil;o a exist&ecirc;ncia de grupo econ&ocirc;mico formado pelas duas primeiras reclamadas e a responsabilidade solid&aacute;ria entre elas pela satisfa&ccedil;&atilde;o de todas as parcelas ora deferidas (art. 2&ordm;, par. 2&ordm;, da CLT).</em><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Referida condena&ccedil;&atilde;o posta-se infundada, injusta e fere os mais basilares princ&iacute;pios do direito!</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Posta rigorosa sua reforma e absolvi&ccedil;&atilde;o da recorrente.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Portanto, n&atilde;o comprovando a rela&ccedil;&atilde;o de trabalho ou a presta&ccedil;&atilde;o de servi&ccedil;os, entre ele Reclamante e a quarta Reclamada, esta &eacute; parte ileg&iacute;tima nesta a&ccedil;&atilde;o. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">LEGITIMIDADE PASSIVA. INCERTEZA QUANTO &Agrave; FIGURA DO EVENTUAL DEVEDOR. N&Atilde;O RECONHECIMENTO. Leg&iacute;tima &eacute; a parte em face de quem se pretende ver declarada situa&ccedil;&atilde;o jur&iacute;dica, ou contra quem se espera uma provid&ecirc;ncia jurisdicional favor&aacute;vel. Em outras palavras, deve a a&ccedil;&atilde;o ser proposta contra o devedor in concreto, segundo os par&acirc;metros de que j&aacute; disp&otilde;e o reclamante preteritamente ao ajuizamento da reclamat&oacute;ria. A postula&ccedil;&atilde;o duvidosa em decorr&ecirc;ncia da incerteza quanto &agrave; figura do eventual devedor implica em extin&ccedil;&atilde;o do processo sem aprecia&ccedil;&atilde;o do seu m&eacute;rito, por ilegitimidade passiva ad causam. Intelig&ecirc;ncia do art. 267, VI do CPC. (PROC. TRT/15&ordf; REGI&Atilde;O N&ordm; 02584-1998-014-15-00-1 REO (1.367/2003-REO-1) 6 RECURSO ORDIN&Aacute;RIO E REMESSA OFICIAL DA VARA DO TRABALHO DE LIMEIRA REMETENTE: VARA DO TRABALHO DE LIMEIRA). (.g.n.) </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; E nem h&aacute; que se falar em solidariedade. Cedi&ccedil;o que, consoante art. 265 do C&oacute;digo Civil, a solidariedade n&atilde;o se presume, resulta da lei ou da vontade das partes. A responsabilidade solid&aacute;ria "n&atilde;o se presume; resulta da lei ou da vontade das partes", (CC, 265), ou, poder&aacute;, no entanto, vir a ser declarada na ocorr&ecirc;ncia de fraude na contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o do empregado. (Ac. 7629/04-PATR Proc. 36666/03-RO). Jos&eacute; Severino da Silva Pitas - TRT - Campinas - DJU - Pg. 66 - 19/3/2004 </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">Ementa: A responsabiliza&ccedil;&atilde;o solid&aacute;ria, pelo car&aacute;ter de abrang&ecirc;ncia que possui, ganhou no direito brasileiro limites r&iacute;gidos de incid&ecirc;ncia, ocorrendo somente quando, por for&ccedil;a de lei ou de contrato, "na mesma obriga&ccedil;&atilde;o concorre mais de um credor, ou mais de um devedor, cada um com direito, ou obriga&ccedil;&atilde;o, a divida toda" (Orlando Comes "in" Obriga&ccedil;&otilde;es. RJ, Forense, 1995, p&aacute;g. 60). Nesse sentido, n&atilde;o encontra suporte legal a busca da recorrente em estabelecer responsabilidade solid&aacute;ria entre seu empregador e o recorrido ("Shopping Center"), que apenas loca seu espa&ccedil;o flsico (contrato civil) para que aquele desenvolva suas rela&ccedil;&otilde;es comerciais.(RO-V 7857/97, Ac. 1&ordf; T. 03640/98) Dilnei Angelo Bil&eacute;ssimo - TRT - SC - DJE - Pg.268 - 5/5/1998 E remansosa jurisprud&ecirc;ncia dos Tribunais p&aacute;trios afasta a solidariedade em casos semelhantes, conforme demonstrado a seguir ao se discutir o m&eacute;rito dessa a&ccedil;&atilde;o trabalhista. De conseguinte, a Segunda Reclamada &eacute; parte manifestamente ileg&iacute;tima para figurar no p&oacute;lo passivo desta reclama&ccedil;&atilde;o trabalhista. Sendo assim, espera, a Segunda Reclamada, seja acolhida esta preliminar para o fim de extinguir o processo, nos termos do art. 267, VI, c/c com o art. 295, II do CPC.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">II - QUANTO AO M&Eacute;RITO </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">III-A) DO PER&Iacute;ODO LABORADO </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O per&iacute;odo e remunera&ccedil;&atilde;o alegados est&atilde;o distoantes do termo rescis&oacute;rio a apresentado pela pr&oacute;pria autora, devendo prevalecer a prova documental produzida.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">DA INEXIST&Ecirc;NCIA DE RESPONSABILIDADE SOLID&Aacute;RIA E/OU SUBSIDI&Aacute;RIA <br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /> <br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /> </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A reclamada comprou produtos vendidos pela primeira r&eacute;, n&atilde;o h&aacute; que se falar em qualquer irregularidade, como demonstra as notas fiscais. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; V&ecirc;-se, claramente, n&atilde;o haver qualquer responsabilidade solid&aacute;ria ou subsidi&aacute;ria, para efeitos trabalhistas, entre esta Quarta Segunda Reclamada e a Primeira Reclamada. </span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Como esclarecido, n&atilde;o houve terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o entre a defendente e a primeira reclamada. Contudo, ainda que tivesse ocorrido n&atilde;o haveria que se falar em irregularidade.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o l&iacute;cita sup&otilde;e a contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o de terceiros para a reealiza&ccedil;&atilde;o de atividade que n&atilde;o se caracteriza como objeto principal ou essencial da empresa contratante, como a atividade-meio.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &Eacute; um fen&ocirc;meno decorrente diretamente da conjuntura econ&ocirc;mica atual, que exige a busca constante de novas alternativas, visando sempre aumentar a competitividade e produtividade de uma empresa. A especializa&ccedil;&atilde;o tamb&eacute;m &eacute; conseq&uuml;&ecirc;ncia dos novos tempos, e visa tamb&eacute;m aprimorar a qualidade das atividades fins da empresa. </span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Por fim, for&ccedil;oso seria admitir que a nega&ccedil;&atilde;o ou rep&uacute;dio a este movimento implicaria num retrocesso econ&ocirc;mico, o que &eacute; inadmiss&iacute;vel. Trata-se portanto, de mat&eacute;ria com reflexos n&atilde;o somente para as partes deste lit&iacute;gio, como tamb&eacute;m para a pr&oacute;pria economia do pa&iacute;s.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Assim, al&eacute;m de ser necess&aacute;ria a contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o de empresa especializada na efetiva&ccedil;&atilde;o do servi&ccedil;o, onde n&atilde;o haja depend&ecirc;ncia hier&aacute;rquica direta, mister se faz a rela&ccedil;&atilde;o direta com a atividade-meio. Tais atividade se coadunam &agrave; lei e &agrave; jurisprud&ecirc;ncia, pois a contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o do servi&ccedil;o terceirizado, vem para agilizar, flexibilizar e agregar competitividade ao neg&oacute;cio, dentro do esp&iacute;rito do instituto "terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o".</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Na realidade, a terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o implica em uma parceria, com a divis&atilde;o dos servi&ccedil;os e das responsabilidades pr&oacute;prias para cada uma. &Eacute; exatamente o que houve no caso dos autos.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O Enunciado 331, III, <em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">in fine</em>, &eacute; claro ao reconhecer a inexist&ecirc;ncia de v&iacute;nculo empregat&iacute;cio, desde que n&atilde;o haja pessoalidade ou subordina&ccedil;&atilde;o, que &eacute; o caso dos autos, com o tomador quando se trate de servi&ccedil;os especializados ligados &agrave; sua atividade-meio. Portanto ainda mais absurda a afirma&ccedil;&atilde;o do reclamante de ter havido "<em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">culpa in eligendo</em>". Mesmo porque a autora j&aacute; desenvolvia o mesmo servi&ccedil;os, h&aacute; v&aacute;rios anos.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O autor alega ser a terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o fraudulenta. No entanto, queda-se inerte em apontar os v&iacute;cios intr&iacute;nsecos e extr&iacute;nsecos que autorizariam esta conclus&atilde;o.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; N&atilde;o traz o reclamante qualquer argumenta&ccedil;&atilde;o plaus&iacute;vel que sequer ensejasse discuss&otilde;es sobre a legalidade da rela&ccedil;&atilde;o havida entre si.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A despeito nossa jurisprud&ecirc;ncia &eacute; extreme de d&uacute;vidas:</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">Terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o l&iacute;cita. N&atilde;o se configura a ilicitude da contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o por empresa interposta, na forma do entendimento consolidado no item III, do Enunciado 331/TST, quando a atividade contratada n&atilde;o constitui fim da empresa prestadora de servi&ccedil;os e n&atilde;o se comprova a exist&ecirc;ncia de subordina&ccedil;&atilde;o direta e pessoalidade na rela&ccedil;&atilde;o entre a tomadora e a empregada terceirizada. (TRT - 3&ordf; R - 5&ordf; T - RO n&ordm; 6701/96 - Rel. Marcos B. Torres - DJMG 07.12.96 - p&aacute;g. 02)</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">Terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o - Legitimidade. A terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o excepcional executa-se pela interposi&ccedil;&atilde;o de m&atilde;o-de-obra em estabelecimento do tomador de servi&ccedil;os. Nessa modalidade, desatende-se &agrave; inteireza da originalidade dos princ&iacute;pios do Direito do Trabalho (integra&ccedil;&atilde;o do trabalhador na empresa e "hipoteca legal" da empresa como garantia de seus direitos - CLT, 2&ordm;) e, por conseq&uuml;&ecirc;ncia, imp&otilde;em-se, para sua legitimidade, a rigorosa observ&acirc;ncia de requisitos, tais como (TST, 331): 1) atividade de apoio; b) autonomia t&eacute;cnica e patrimonial do prestador de servi&ccedil;os; c) n&atilde;o pessoalidade do executor do trabalho; d) n&atilde;o subordina&ccedil;&atilde;o ao tomador de servi&ccedil;os. (TRT - 15&ordf; R - 3&ordf; T - Ac. n&ordm; 17105/98 - REL. JOS&Eacute; PITAS - DJSP 18.06.98 - p&aacute;g. 49)</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">Terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o l&iacute;cita. N&atilde;o configurada a hip&oacute;tese de intermedia&ccedil;&atilde;o de m&atilde;o-de-obra, repudiada pelo Direito, a responsabilidade do tomador que contrata regularmente a realiza&ccedil;&atilde;o de servi&ccedil;os alheios &agrave; sua atividade-fim, s&oacute; gera responsabilidade civil capaz de lhe impor qualquer repara&ccedil;&atilde;o, no caso de restar provada culpa, na acep&ccedil;&atilde;o restrita do termo, na constitui&ccedil;&atilde;o e desenvolvimento do v&iacute;nculo jur&iacute;dico assim formado. (TRT - 3&ordf; R - 1&ordf; T - RO n&ordm; 25726/95 - Rel. Juiz Luiz Carlos Teixeira Bomfim - DJRJ 04.11.98 - p&aacute;g. 86) (RDT 12/98, p&aacute;g 56)</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">Terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o - Atividade-meio - Condena&ccedil;&atilde;o subsidi&aacute;ria. Preconiza o Enunciado n&ordm; 331, III, do c. TST que "n&atilde;o forma v&iacute;nculo de emprego com o tomador a contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o de servi&ccedil;os de vigil&acirc;ncia (Lei n&ordm; 7.102, de 20.06.83), de conserva&ccedil;&atilde;o e limpeza, bem como a de servi&ccedil;os especializados ligados &agrave; atividade-meio do tomador, desde que inexistentes a pessoalidade e a subordina&ccedil;&atilde;o direta". Desta feita, quando caracterizada a atividade-meio da r&eacute;, n&atilde;o se h&aacute; de falar em condena&ccedil;&atilde;o subsidi&aacute;ria. (TRT - 12&ordf; R - 1&ordf; T - Ac. n&ordm; 12993/97 - Red. Juiz Dilnei Bil&eacute;ssimo - DJSC 08.10.97 - p&aacute;g. 148)</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">Inexiste &oacute;bice legal ao aproveitamento de m&atilde;o-de-obra terceirizada para a realiza&ccedil;&atilde;o de servi&ccedil;os vinculados &agrave;s atividades-meio da empresa tomadora. (TRT 12&ordf; R Ac. n&ordm; 2932/96 Rel&ordf;. Ju&iacute;za M&ordf;. Aparecida Caitano DJSC 13.06.96 p&aacute;g. 89)</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Vale mencionar inclusive que esta tipo de&nbsp; terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o h&aacute; muito vem sendo acompanhada pelo Minist&eacute;rio P&uacute;blico do Trabalho, atrav&eacute;s da Procuradoria Regional do Trabalho da 15&ordm; Regi&atilde;o.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Inicialmente, desde idos de 1994, o MPT entendia il&iacute;cita tal modalidade, tanto que encetou v&aacute;rias A&ccedil;&otilde;es Civis P&uacute;blicas como o escopo de proibir a terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o em Franca.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A partir de 2000, entendendo que tal terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o faz parte da cultura francana, assim como dos usos e costumes, sendo praticadada de forma rotineira, e incita a pr&oacute;pria atividade cal&ccedil;adista, ap&oacute;s minucioso estudo, o MPT em conjunto com o Sindicato dos Trab. Nas Ind. de Cal&ccedil;ado de Franca, e o Sindicato das Industrias de Cal&ccedil;ados de Franca, firmaram diversos "Termos de Ajuste de Conduta - TAC", como escopo a regulamenta&ccedil;&atilde;o da quest&atilde;o.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Outrossim, periodicamente, referidos &oacute;rg&atilde;os vem realizando conven&ccedil;&otilde;es e assembl&eacute;ias no audit&oacute;rio do Senac, em Franca, com o objetivo de orientar e disciplinar a quest&atilde;o.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Neste particular a jurisprud&ecirc;ncia &eacute; esclarecedora:</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">SOLIDARIEDADE - DONO DE OBRA - A condena&ccedil;&atilde;o solid&aacute;ria do mero dono de obra, por aplica&ccedil;&atilde;o anal&oacute;gica do art. 455, da CLT, pressup&otilde;e prova de inidoneidade econ&ocirc;mico-financeira do empreiteiro contratado e culpa "in eligendo" do dono da obra. Simples alega&ccedil;&atilde;o n&atilde;o autoriza condena&ccedil;&atilde;o solid&aacute;ria pela d&iacute;vida trabalhista. (TRT 9&ordf; R. - RO 1.384/95 - Ac. 3&ordf; T. 24.376/95 - Rel. Juiz Jo&atilde;o Oreste Dalazen - DJPR 29.09.1995)</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">DONO DA OBRA - RESPONSABILIDADE SOLID&Aacute;RIA - IMPOSSIBILIDADE - Ausente demonstra&ccedil;&atilde;o de que ao tempo da contrata&ccedil;&atilde;o a empreiteira n&atilde;o era inid&ocirc;nea, e tampouco havendo ind&iacute;cios de fraude entre as contratantes, de forma a atrair a aplica&ccedil;&atilde;o do art. 9&ordm; consolidado, inadmiss&iacute;vel a condena&ccedil;&atilde;o solid&aacute;ria do dono da obra com fundamento na culpa "in eligendo". (TRT 9&ordf; R. - RO 1.518/96 - Ac. 5&ordf; T. 23.483/96 - Rel. Juiz Luiz Felipe Haj Mussi - DJPR 08.11.1996)</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Vige entre n&oacute;s o princ&iacute;pio da legalidade que estabelece que ningu&eacute;m ser&aacute; obrigado a fazer ou deixar de fazer alguma coisa sen&atilde;o em virtude de lei. Referido princ&iacute;pio abrange duas situa&ccedil;&otilde;es: inicialmente, de que&nbsp; n&atilde;o se pode fazer o que a lei pro&iacute;be e, finalmente, de que presume-se l&iacute;cito tudo aquilo que a lei n&atilde;o pro&iacute;be.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Se uma empresa confia a outrem - firma composta por pessoas com larga&nbsp; experi&ecirc;ncia no mercado - a confec&ccedil;&atilde;o de alguns servi&ccedil;os, o que de maneira alguma infringe o nosso ordenamento jur&iacute;dico. Neste passo, estamos diante de uma rela&ccedil;&atilde;o albergada no campo do Direito Civil.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Este procedimento, inclusive, vem sendo constantemente utilizado pelas empresas, preocupadas em atingir resultados mais eficientes e de melhor qualidade.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No ramo cal&ccedil;adista n&atilde;o poderia ser diferente, pois nas &uacute;ltimas d&eacute;cadas as empresas brasileiras foram "atacadas" em demasiado pela concorr&ecirc;ncia externa. </span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Diante desse quadro, as empresas passaram a utilizar-se de empresas especializadas nos mais diversos setores (o chamado "setor terci&aacute;rio" da economia), sendo certo o largo investimento realizado por elas no decorrer dos tempos.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sobre este fen&ocirc;meno, trazemos &agrave; baila brilhante decis&atilde;o proclamada pelo Tribunal Regional do Trabalho da 15&ordf; Regi&atilde;o, 1&ordf; Turma; nos autos do Recurso Ordin&aacute;rio n&ordm; 010662/1999-SP; tendo como Relator o Dr. Juiz Luiz Antonio Lazarim:</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">"A&Ccedil;&Atilde;O CIVIL P&Uacute;BLICA - LIBERDADE DE CONTRATAR - TERCEIRIZA&Ccedil;&Atilde;O - LICITUDE. A terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o &eacute; forma usual de flexibiliza&ccedil;&atilde;o no campo do direito laboral. Vedar sua pr&aacute;tica implica em inger&ecirc;ncia na administra&ccedil;&atilde;o dos neg&oacute;cios empresariais, em detrimento ao princ&iacute;pio da livre iniciativa assegurada pela Carta Constitucional, inserto no cap&iacute;tulo que disciplina a ordem econ&ocirc;mica, al&eacute;m de representar ofensa o princ&iacute;pio da legalidade."</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></strong></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Esta a ementa do ac&oacute;rd&atilde;o referido. Em face da import&acirc;ncia e do enorme valor jur&iacute;dico desta pe&ccedil;a, mencionaremos aqui tamb&eacute;m algumas passagens do corpo do ac&oacute;rd&atilde;o, assim como de algumas cita&ccedil;&otilde;es doutrin&aacute;rias utilizadas pelo Ilustre Relator.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">"...atua, no caso "sob judice", em defesa do interesse da coletividade como um todo, em ver cessadas as contrata&ccedil;&otilde;es irregulares...invoca o inciso LVI do artigo 5&ordm; da Carta Constitucional como base legal para o postulado na inicial. Todavia, a puni&ccedil;&atilde;o, como o pr&oacute;prio dispositivo predetermina, deve vir da lei.</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">Ao remeter &agrave; lei o estabelecer puni&ccedil;&otilde;es para as discrimina&ccedil;&otilde;es atentat&oacute;rias dos direitos e liberdades fundamentais, est&aacute; o constituinte, indicando que o legislador ordin&aacute;rio o dever&aacute; tipificar tal comportamento como delituoso e, portanto, pass&iacute;vel de apena&ccedil;&atilde;o. (CEPAM, Breves Anota&ccedil;&otilde;es &agrave; Constitui&ccedil;&atilde;o de 1988,. Editora Atlas - 1990, p&aacute;gina 49 (citado pelo Relator)).</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">,</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">...Aflora direito maior, de assegurar os princ&iacute;pios que alicer&ccedil;am o Estado Democr&aacute;tico - a legalidade e a livre iniciativa empresarial inseridos como salvaguarda pelo Legislador Constituinte.</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">Ningu&eacute;m est&aacute; obrigado a fazer ou deixar de fazer alguma coisa sen&atilde;o em virtude de lei, preconiza o princ&iacute;pio da legalidade insculpido como garantia constitucional...</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></strong></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></strong></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agora, fazendo men&ccedil;&atilde;o ao mestre Celso Ribeiro Bastos na obra "Coment&aacute;rios &agrave; Constitui&ccedil;&atilde;o do Brasil - Ed. Saraiva:</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">"O princ&iacute;pio da legalidade &eacute; de abrang&ecirc;ncia mais ampla. Por ele fica certo que qualquer comando jur&iacute;dico impondo comportamentos for&ccedil;ados h&aacute; de provir de regra legal.</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">...o princ&iacute;pio da legalidade garante o particular contra os poss&iacute;veis desmandos do Executivo e do pr&oacute;prio Judici&aacute;rio...</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">...o princ&iacute;pio da legalidadel eleva, portanto, a lei &agrave; condi&ccedil;&atilde;o de ve&iacute;culo supremo da vontade do Estado.</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">Dele, se extrai a id&eacute;ia de que a liberdade, em qualquer de suas formas, s&oacute; pode sofrer restri&ccedil;&otilde;es por normas jur&iacute;dicas preceptivas (que imp&otilde;em uma conduta positiva) ou proibitivas (que imp&otilde;em um absten&ccedil;&atilde;o), provenientes do Poder Legislativo e elaboradas segundo o procedimento estabelecido na Constitui&ccedil;&atilde;o."</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mais &agrave; frente, o Relator cita o doutrinador Pimenta Bueno:</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">"a liberdade n&atilde;o &eacute;, pois a exce&ccedil;&atilde;o, &eacute; sim a regra geral, o princ&iacute;pio absoluto, o Direito positivo; a proibi&ccedil;&atilde;o, a restri&ccedil;&atilde;o, isso sim &eacute; que s&atilde;o as exce&ccedil;&otilde;es, e que por isso mesmo precisam ser provocadas, achar-se expressamente pronunciadas pela lei, e n&atilde;o por modo duvidoso, sim, formal, positivo..."</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Continua o Relator:</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">"A terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o &eacute; forma usual de flexibiliza&ccedil;&atilde;o no campo do direito laboral. Vedar sua pr&aacute;tica implicaria em inger&ecirc;ncia na administra&ccedil;&atilde;o dos neg&oacute;cios empresariais, em detrimento ao princ&iacute;pio da livre iniciativa assegurado pela Carta Constitucional, inserto no cap&iacute;tulo que disciplina a ordem econ&ocirc;mica, al&eacute;m de representar ofensa ao princ&iacute;pio da legalidade."</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">N&atilde;o cabe ao Poder Judici&aacute;rio interferir nos neg&oacute;cios privados, vedando a pr&aacute;tica de atos, onde a Casa Legisladora, f&oacute;rum pr&oacute;prio para a solu&ccedil;&atilde;o e disciplinamento dos fatos sociais que motivam as normas legais, n&atilde;o atuou de modo a impor qualquer proibi&ccedil;&atilde;o.</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 35.4pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">O desenvolvimento nos dias atuais, ante o fen&ocirc;meno da globaliza&ccedil;&atilde;o, requer um Estado menos legalista, deixando os parceiros sociais delinearem suas normas e direitos de conduta, valorizando, assim, os frutos da negocia&ccedil;&atilde;o coletiva."</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Estas, portanto, as passagens do ac&oacute;rd&atilde;o que acreditamos mais interessar para o caso em tela. Ficando certo, pois, sobre a legalidade da terceiriza&ccedil;&atilde;o - que mais uma vez insista-se, n&atilde;o &eacute; proibida.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Improcede pois o pedido de reconhecimento de v&iacute;nculo empregat&iacute;cio diretamente com a segunda r&eacute;.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">Ad argumentandum tamtum, </em>caso assim, n&atilde;o entenda os &Iacute;nclitos Julgadores, ainda assim os pedidos acess&oacute;rios improcedem.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">II - Dos pedidos acess&oacute;rios</span></strong></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">- Da multa do Art. 477 CLT.</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoBodyText2" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 200%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Por outro lado, improcede o pedido de aplica&ccedil;&atilde;o da multa prevista no art. 477 celetista. Primeiro porque trata-se de pedido inepto na forma da Lei. Entretanto caso assim n&atilde;o entendido, no m&eacute;rito &eacute; de igual modo improcedente.</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A duas porque sendo certo a inaplicabilidade da multa no caso de reconhecimento judicial de verba, por se tratar de mat&eacute;rias controvertidas, n&atilde;o reconhecidas pelo empregador, n&atilde;o possui qualquer raz&atilde;o o pedido contraposto. </span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Neste sentido , acompanha-nos a mais s&aacute;bia jurisprud&ecirc;ncia:</span></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: -21.35pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;">&nbsp;</span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 36pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">MULTA DO PAR&Aacute;GRAFO 8&ordm; DO ART. 477 DA CLT - N&Atilde;O CABIMENTO - A multa enfocada &eacute; expressamente prevista pelo n&atilde;o adimplemento das parcelas constantes do recibo ou instrumento de rescis&atilde;o, nos prazos das al&iacute;neas "a" e "b" do par&aacute;grafo 6&ordm; desse mesmo dispositivo consolidado. Portanto, uma vez que as quest&otilde;es do v&iacute;nculo empregat&iacute;cio e das pr&oacute;prias verbas da rescis&atilde;o eram fruto de controv&eacute;rsia que somente foi decidido judicialmente, o reconhecimento favor&aacute;vel ao empregado n&atilde;o enseja a comina&ccedil;&atilde;o legal enfocada, porque hip&oacute;tese n&atilde;o prevista no texto consolidado. </em><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;"><span lang="EN-US">(TRT 2&ordf; R. - RO 02950310448 - Ac. 9&ordf; T. 02970030459 - Rel. </span></em><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">Juiz Gilberto Alain Baldacci - DOESP 04.02.1997)</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 36pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">&nbsp;</em></span></p>\n<p><span style="font-size: medium;"> </span></p>\n<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm -21.35pt 0.0001pt 36pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><em style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal;">MULTA CONSOLIDADA - DESCABIMENTO - RECONHECIMENTO DE DIREITO APENAS EM JU&Iacute;ZO - Se o reconhecimento de eventual direito ocorre apenas com a publica&ccedil;&atilde;o da senten&ccedil;a, indene de d&uacute;vidas que anteriormente n&atilde;o havia falar-se em obriga&ccedil;&atilde;o patronal de pag&aacute;-los, no prazo previsto no artigo 477 da CLT, porquanto controvertido &agrave; &eacute;poca. Logo, imp&otilde;e-se concluir que inexiste mora patronal e na aus&ecirc;ncia desta n&atilde;o incidem as disposi&ccedil;&otilde;es do &sect; 8&ordm; do artigo 477 da CLT, que por tratar-se de penalidade deve sofrer interpreta&ccedil;&atilde;o restritiva. (TRT 10&ordf; R. - RO 5.617/97 - 3&ordf; T. - Rel.
